Title: XXII.
Writer: Jonathan E. Steinberg (created by), Robert Levine (created by), Jonathan E. Steinberg, Lisa Schultz Boyd, Marc Berzenski (staff writer), Lisa Schultz Boyd (staff writer), Joshua Rothenberger (staff writer)
Actors: Toby Stephens, Hannah New, Luke Arnold, Tom Hopper
Plot: Change begins to take root in Nassau; on a strange island, Flint, Silver and Billy are unified against a common adversary; Blackbeard and Vane formulate a plan of escape.
